descr:
A simple and user-friendly service for time series forecasting and visualization.
Predictify allows you to test various forecasting models through an intuitive interface.
vizualization.title: Data Visualization
vizualization.descr: Visualize results with clear and interactive charts.
testing.title: Model Testing
testing.descr: Evaluate the performance of different models and choose the best ones.
settings.title: Flexible Settings
settings.descr: Adjust a wide range of parameters for models and charts.
help: To see examples or try it yourself — go to the «Forecasting» section.
